title: Supermodel Karlie Kloss Apparently Thought TLCâ€™s â€˜Waterfallsâ€™ Was a Destinyâ€™s Child Song
text:
Supermodel and self-professed super BeyoncÃ© fan Karlie Kloss has learned that while Destinyâ€™s Child has brought us many of the quintessential girl power anthems of our time, they were not responsible for the hit song, â€œWaterfalls,â€ which was performed by the inimitable ladies of TLC .
In a Q+A that Kloss filled out for Love Magazine , the runway regular disclosed that she is the biggest fan of BeyoncÃ© and that sheâ€™s been a fan of her since â€œDestinyâ€™s Child 2003!â€
Kloss goes on to explain that sheâ€™s a fangirl because of Queen Beyâ€™s â€œcreativity and passionâ€ and of course, her â€œSWAG!â€ However, later in the survey, this fangirl stumbled a little bit, when she explained that Bey is â€œsoundtrack to my LIFE!â€ and mentioned â€œWaterfalls.â€ This slight misstep did not go unnoticed by the Bey Hive, who took to the web to call out the egregious error.
